attributes.action: Ban the animals in the circus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown

I think that the animals in the cicus is completly inapproprate  animals are that the innocent animals are in  it is the the circus in the first place letalone allowed to be let in once agian again. the conditions that they go through are digusting and no person or animal should go through it. Th  ey will never be able to be let back in to the wild because they would not be able to fend for themself. It is not appropriate. It should be stopped!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
